name: Aqua Fry
description:
Dive into the depths of underwater mayhem in this local multiplayer game, where up to 4 players engage in a chaotic free-for-all, akin to shooting pool but with a unique aquatic twist. Aqua Fry combines strategic gameplay, fast-paced action, and a splash of humor for an unforgettable gaming experience.

Embark on an underwater adventure where you control quirky sea creatures in a top-down arena. The objective? Knock your opponents into the clutches of menacing sea creatures, trapping them in bubbles and putting them to sleep. But beware, the colossal Eye enemy is always in hot pursuit, adding an extra layer of intensity to every match.

Key Features:

  • Simple Controls: Joystick + one-button gameplay. Move with the joystick. Shoot, Charge, Defend with any face/shoulder button on your controller.
  • Local Multiplayer Mayhem: Gather your friends or challenge AI opponents in intense 1-4 player local multiplayer matches. The more, the merrier – or in this case, the more chaotic!
  • Free-for-All Gameplay: Experience the thrill of free-for-all gameplay, where every sea creature is out for themselves. Master the art of precision and timing to outmaneuver your rivals.
  • Bubble Tactics: Utilize bubbles as both weapons and shields. Strategically use bubbles to defend against incoming attacks. Bounce the Eye enemy away from you with a well-aimed shot.
  • Dynamic Arenas: Engage in battles across diverse underwater arenas, each with its own challenges and opportunities. Adapt to your surroundings to emerge victorious. Knock around parts of the arena and use the environment to your advantage!
  • Egg-citing Progression: Win matches to hatch one of your five eggs. Successfully hatch all five eggs to face the ultimate challenge: a boss fish showdown. Defeat the boss to unlock new and exciting playable characters. NOTE: All characters have the same abilities.

    Dive in today. Are you ready to make a splash and become the ultimate sea champion?
